page.title: 13Mattingley - Social Concerns
page.content: One of the main concerns of the local inhabitants is the{threat of the {proposed mini-town}which may be built between Hook & Mattingley. Although a 5 year reprieve has been granted, 1991 is not that far off! Another real concern is the{threat {to commonland}such as Hazeley Heath & Mattingley Green. Due to a 'loophole' in a recent Government paper the land isn't as safe as it should be. Although most of the inhabitants of the block chose to live there, some would like the{shops}to be nearer & would like{mains drainage}& the option of{gas}for their heating & cooking. Some are rather concerned that the nearest{doctor's surgery}is at Hook or Hartley Wintney - a distance of 3 miles in most cases.
